ygData.subject: Re: Monk Armor and the short end of the stick
ygData.msgSnippet: I only have one thing to say here, about the taunt thing.  All of our secondary attacks are also taunts. AND if you keep trying to disarm a mob, even if they
ygData.messageBody:
I only have one thing to say here, about the taunt thing. All of our
secondary attacks are also taunts. AND if you keep trying to disarm a mob,
even if they don't have a weapon, well, there's another taunt. I was
recently in a party with a lvl 36 warrior, myself being lvl 31 and had NO
problem taking dmg if I wanted to. I do agree they should beef up our hits
now a little bit though.
